name: Black Mountain Sujin Tea (Rich)
description:
HEI: 21
Effects: Immune Boosting, Cognitive Boosting
Sujin root tea, native to Elysium IV, is a traditional Tevarin beverage and has been produced for thousands of years. Black Mountain steeps only premium roots to make their delicious brew.
description_cn:
HEI：21
效果：免疫增强，认知增强
苏津根茶，原产自极乐 IV，是塔维因的传统饮品，至今已有数千年的历史。黑山保证，我们只选用优质的根茎来煎制香醇的茶汤。
